Posts.EditableText: You should make a chat on this website.  As in a instant.  Or just a chat.
Posts.HTML: You should make a chat on this website.  As in a instant.  Or just a chat.

Posts.EditableText:
There honestly isn't enough activity on the site or forums to warrant its own chat system. If you'd like to chat with other forum members you're free to set up your own IRC channel or something if you'd like.

I can usually be found on irc.surrealchat.net across various channels. I've been staff there since '05 when the network I previously staffed on merged there. I did make a Quest-related channel once, but it was never really used. There are rarely more than a couple on the forums at a time, and usually just one.
